太好玩了。出门就被爆头
Wszystko dobrze fajnie ale usuńcie rusków

Game is good.
Community is trash. Too many people trying to be the hero, no teammwork in the lower ranks. Heaven forbid you try to help someone by giving them tips, they shut down mentally and start throwing sometimes. Or you get cheaters once in a while too. People are impatient af and this game is about patience, teamwork and communication. Run away if you are solo que, sometimes you get paired with a lobby of 4 and they leave you out of the communication since using push to talk is too hard for some people I guess. My mic button is on my mouse and i have no problems, can kill someone while communicating no prob. Short coms and too the point, nobody cares what you are eating smoking, how your day went or how have 1 more kill than someone and have all the power to crush your teams morale. Just chill tf out and communicate and make plays. Yes this is about you hardstuck silvers.
jogo desde muuito tempo  e com certeza e o melhor jogo do mundo
Best game to play. I usually play in Faceit because it's a better community more friendly players and serious.
